description:
A desktop app that generates image previews and compressed videos of formats such as HEIC photos and HEVC videos, ensuring proper display of Synology Photos files on any devices


Important Note
1. The version is expected to be available in all regions within the next few days. The actual time of release may vary slightly depending on the region.
Compatibility & Installation
1. Synology Image Assistant for desktop 1.0.2 requires:
- Synology Image Assistant Extension 1.0.0 and above
- Synology Photos 1.7.0 and above
Bug Fixed
macOS
1. Fixed an issue where generated previews might display as white.
